item.description:
We'll gather early to mid-afternoon to relax and socialize, discuss lore, and then blot. As day turns to evening we'll feast and socialize more... perhaps even sumble.

If interested, please contact me. If you haven't met any TRK members before then you MUST take time before Ostara to meet one of us and be "vouchsafed" beforehand. In other words, a good face-to-face vibe is required first. Call or email and let's talk.

Wassail!
Mike Hicks
TRK member and event host
item.how_to_find_us: It's my home. Call or email for directions.
item.why: Because TRK rocks! But if you've met us you already know that. :)

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: Ostara Celebration w/Two Ravens Kindred
